articles.author: Barak Ravid
articles.title: Hamas releases Edan Alexander, last living American hostage in Gaza - Axios
articles.description: It was a "good will gesture" from Hamas to Trump ahead of his trip.
articles.content:
Hamas released Israeli-American hostage Edan Alexander on Monday after holding him for 584 days.
Why it matters: Hamas released Alexander as a "good faith" gesture towards President Trump ahead of h… [+2654 chars]
